summary: A common man's ability to defeat the devil. A cop identifies the mystery and solves the problem.
cast: Cheran|Ananyaa Shah|Y.G. Mahendran|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan|V. Jayaprakash|Manicka R. Vinayagam|Iniya|Sunil Choudhary|Ameer Sultan|Neetu Chandra|Srushti Dange|Charulatha Mani|G. Marimuthu|Aadukalam Naren
title: Yutham Sei
